title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9500.1 - Project review-statement of purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9500.1 - Project review-statement of purposes

State Regulations

The purposes of reviewing projects, as provided in the
statute, are to encourage public and private agencies and persons to undertake
projects which reflect a careful balancing of all the interests of the St. Lawrence River and eastern Lake Ontario area, and to facilitate the carrying
out of such projects. These rules and regulations establish the procedures for
reviewing projects. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9500.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
